name: Into the Aether
description:
Created over the course of about a month for the "NaNoRenO 2023" jam. (Although it was finished just too late to honestly enter.)

Into the Aether is a short narrative-poem visual novel.

Sent into the Aether on a task set by magi, which way will you turn? Will you find what you were sent for, or another end entire? And if you do find that former, what will you do with it?

Number of endings: Five

Choice frequency: High

Content Warnings:

  • Maybe a bit eerie at times.
  • Being pinned
  • Being set to a task against one's will
